entry.name: Fast Walsh Transform
entry.description: Naturally(Hadamard)-ordered Fast Walsh Transform for batching vectors of arbitrary eligible lengths that are power of two in size.
entry.scope: 1:CUDA Advanced Topics,3:Linear Algebra,1:Data-Parallel Algorithms,2:Image Processing,2:Data Compression,2:Video Codecs
entry.supported-env: linux:x86_64, linux:i686, windows7, macosx:x86_64, macosx:i686, :arm, linux:aarch64
